# Manojit Ballav - Principal Product Manager

> Personal website of Manojit Ballav, Principal Product Manager at Lumio (Circuit House Technologies). Expert in Smart TV, Connected TV (CTV), and AI-driven advertising. Former Xiaomi India.

## About

Manojit Ballav (also known as Mono) is a Principal Product Manager at Lumio, a smart TV startup founded by former Xiaomi executives. He specializes in:

- Smart TV product development
- Connected TV (CTV) and streaming platforms
- AI-powered advertising and personalization
- FAST (Free Ad-Supported Streaming TV) channels
- Display technologies (Mini LED, QLED, OLED)

Previously worked at Xiaomi India on Mi TV and Redmi TV product lines.

## Key Topics & Expertise

- Lumio Smart TVs (Vision 9, Vision 7, Vision Arc)
- CTV industry trends and market analysis
- AI in CTV advertising
- FAST channels in India
- TV display technology comparisons
- Indian Smart TV market ($22B+ market)
- Product Management in consumer electronics
